item.title: Upcoming Events
item.description: SKEGNESS COACH TRIP `24 Sunday 12th May 2024 We are happy to announce the return of our popular Skegness coach trip on Sunday 12th May 2024! Departs: Leicester General Hospital @08:00 (Free Parking) Returns: Leaving Skegness @17:00 Tickets are available on a first-come, first-served basis at the bargain cost of just Â£15 per person. Renal patients will get refunded on the day. For bookings contact: Ann 07702 703 882 or Claire 07702 703 873

item.title: Events
item.description: Social contact is important for mental health and wellbeing, we hold events throughout the year for patients and their family members why not come along and join us. We try to arrange a variety of events to suit different tastes and interests. Do you look good in Purple? Join us!
